title: E. Jane Lorimer Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship awards for students enrolled in the Business School at the University of Colorado Denver. Scholarship recipients will be selected in accordance with established procedures for awarding merit based and need based scholarships.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship awards for students enrolled in the Business School at the University of Colorado Denver. Scholarship recipients will be selected in accordance with established procedures for awarding merit based and need based scholarships. Preference shall be given to those students who experienced growing up in foster care.
